brand.name: Nordea
brand.primaryCTA: Join us to get financing for your company

valueProps.text: Tailored corporate loans for business expansion
Unsecured business loans up to 25,000 euros
Overdraft facilities for cash flow management
Corporate leasing to keep equipment up to date

pains: Need for financing to support business growth
Requirement for financial flexibility and risk management
Challenges in managing cash flow and liquidity
proof: Nordea Business platform for managing financing

facts.evidence: Get the right financing to create the best conditions for growth and stability in your company.
We can tailor a loan to support your needs.

facts.text: Corporate FlexiCredit offers up to 25,000 euros.
facts.evidence: Unsecured business loan up to 25,000 euros.
Nordea assumes the monetary liability on behalf of your company.

facts.text: Overdraft facility helps balance cash flow.
facts.evidence: Helps you to balance the fluctuations in your cash flow.

facts.text: Corporate leasing helps keep equipment updated.
facts.evidence: You are able to keep your equipment up to date at all times.
With hire purchase the financed asset serves as collateral up to 80% of the financing share.

facts.text: Nordea Business platform for financing management.
facts.page: Keep track of your financing online
facts.evidence: Monitor all your company's financing in one place.

facts.page: Get an estimate of a suitable loan amount with our loan calculator
facts.evidence: With the help of our loan calculator you are able to evaluate how big of a loan your company can take out.

facts.text: Nordea provides financial risk management advice.
facts.page: What financial risk management does Nordea offer?
facts.evidence: Our experts are ready to advise you on currency hedging, debt management and much more.
